title: Is President Trump Trying to Get Melania Deported? | Bill de Blasio & Jada Pinkett Smith
itunes:title: Is President Trump Trying to Get Melania Deported? | Bill de Blasio & Jada Pinkett Smith
description:
Trevor suspects President Trump is angling to get his wife deported, Bill de Blasio talks about his 2020 White House bid, and Jada Pinkett Smith discusses "Red Table Talk."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
